definitions: Cook (food, especially meat) by prolonged exposure to heat in an oven or over a fire.
Subject (someone) to good-humored ridicule or criticism.
Heat (coffee beans or nuts) to a desired degree of brownness and flavor.
examples: She roasts a chicken every Sunday.
He roasts his friends mercilessly, but they know it's all in good fun.
The company roasts its own coffee beans.
